Function Documentation

char * fx_get_original_ID ( long  id  ) 

get the original id of the user.

if the user is pc user, it will return the fetion id. if the user is the mobile user, it will return the user's mobile.

Parameters:
msg The original msg.
Returns:
the no format message, return NULL if the msg is wrong format.

char * fx_msg_no_format ( const char *  msg  ) 

simple paser the msg, remove the <Font></Font> tags.

Parameters:
msg The original msg.
Returns:
the no format message when it is a correct msg, or return original msg.

char * fx_msg_qt_format ( const char *  msg  ) 

transform msg format to qt support.

Parameters:
msg The original msg.
Returns:
the msg which 's format was supported by QT GUI when it is a correct msg, or return original msg if the msg is no format.
